level_of_trading_knowledge.text: What is your financial knowledge regarding leveraged products?

trading_experience_in_stocks_bonds_etfs.text: Over the last year, how many times have you invested in stocks and/or ETFs?

trading_experience_in_contracts.text: How many times have you invested in Contracts for Difference and other Leverage Products, over the last year?

trading_experience_in_crypto.text: Over the last year, how many times have you invested in crypto?

market_moves_by_3_percent.text: The market moves by 3%. Trading with which leverage would lead to the largest potential profit or loss?

required_margin_for_1_lot.text: What would be the required margin in AED for 1 lot (100,000) AED/USD, if your leverage is 1:100?

type_of_closing_order.text: What type of closing order can you choose to help limit losses when trading?

how_much_do_you_have_to_pay_to_buy.text: How much margin in AED is going to be used to buy 1,000,000 AED/USD through an account that its leverage is 1:50?

market_moving_against_you.text: The market is moving against you and your account has a stop-out level of 50%. Your account will be stopped out in which of the following situations?

employment_status.text: What best describes your employment status?

employment_type.text: What is your occupation - work industry?

source_of_income.text: What is the origin of funds you plan to invest on NAGA?

annual_income.text: What is your annual net income in USD?

net_worth.text: Your Net Worth in USD (Assets less Liabilities)?

liquid_assets_net_worth.text: Your total cash and liquid assets in your Net Worth?

anticipated_amount.text: How much do you plan to deposit into NAGA account in USD over 1 year?

expected_deposit_and_withdrawal_method.text: How do you plan to deposit your funds to NAGA?

underlying_instrument_on_contracts.text: Which assets do you plan to trade at NAGA? Please select from one to four options:

investment_objectives_naga.text: What best describes your primary purpose of trading with us?

time_to_hold_open_positions.text: How long do you plan to leave your positions open?

level_of_risk_to_tolerate_in_exchange.text: Please state the level of risk (volatility) you will tolerate in exchange for the expected gain from your annual investments with us?

currency.text: Please choose the currency for your trading account:
